channel.title: Hi I'm Medini N B
channel.description: Recent content on Hi I'm Medini N B

item.title: Bloodshot eye
item.description: July 2021 | Bloodshot eyes | Prismacolour’s colourpencils for the colouring, Sakura micropens for the eyelashes, and Sakura Gelly Roll White pen for the highlights. I have used Strathmore’s Toned Tan paper. Took me roughly 2.5 hours to finish.

item.title: Amethyst
item.description: March 2021 | Amethyst | Amethyst stone using Prismacolour’s colourpencils on Strathmore’s Toned Gray paper. Took me roughly 6 hours to complete.

item.title: Twix?
item.description: March 2021 | Twix | üç´ drawn using Prismacolour’s colourpencils on Strathmore’s Toned Gray paper. It took me roughly 9 hours to complete.

item.title: Kinda my github username too
item.description: December 2020 | Medusa, from the Greek Mythology | Drawn using Sakura micropens and black ballpoint pen on A4 paper. I scanned the final version to give it a better touch.

item.title: friendly neighbourhood spiderman
item.description: October 2020 | Peter Parker | üï∑ using Prismacolour’s colourpencils and Sakura Gelly Roll White pen on Strathmore’s Toned Tan paper.

item.title: Megumi Fushiguro
item.description: June 2021 | Chimera Shadow Garden - Megumi Fushiguro from Jujutsu Kaisen | Drawn using Sakura micropens and markers. Scanned the final version and edited the text on the text box because I could not mimic the comic font perfectly ;-;

item.title: Bright sunlight indeed
item.description: November 2020 | Golden Hour | Micropen artwork using Sakura micropens and black ballpoint pen on a diary.

item.title: Donuts
item.description: October 2020 | Doughnut? Donut? | üç© drawn using Prismacolour’s colourpencils on Strathmore’s Toned Tan Paper. I have used Sakura Gelly Roll White pen for the highlights.

item.title: Yet another micropen work
item.description: December 2018 | Drawn using Sakura micropens on a diary.

item.title: Pencils and Charcoal
item.description: September 2018 | Pencil sketch using charcoal and Staedtler Mars Lumograph pencils.

item.title: Toddler
item.description: August 2018 | Artwork using blue ballpoint pen.

item.title: Bet your spidey-sense did not see another spiderman drawing coming
item.description: April 2021 | “With great power, comes great responsibility” | üï∑ Colour marker base and Prismacolour’s colourpencils on Strathmore’s Toned Gray paper. Sakura Gelly Roll White pen for the final touch-up.

item.description: April 2019 | Artwork using Staedtler Mars Lumograph pencils on a diary.

item.title: micropen works never stop, don't they?
